author: Has the Malaysian Govt been sneakily blocking political sites? | CILISOS - Current Issues Tambah Pedas!
content: […] Well, the Malaysian government is known to have purchasedÂ FinFisher, a very intrusive stealth surveillance software “used by oppressive governments for a wide range of human rights abuses“. This software was apparently distributed in the form of a document listing the candidates for GE13. […]
